word:
"I am the Lord your God, which have separated you from other people." "Ye shall be holy unto Me; for I the Lord am holy, and have 


                                     -25- 

severed you from other people, that ye should be Mine." "The very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ." "This people have I formed for Myself; they shall show forth My praise." "Ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should show forth the praises of Him who hath called you out of darkness into His marvelous light."
